dialog: When I think the time is right, I use the most efficient way to solve a problem.
Not everyone will agree with me, but that's me.
I'm fallon zhu, as in Jimmy Fallon and fallon fox, a 145pound kickass policeman.
I honestly did not do it.
I'm gonna kill you, you little bitch!
Chloe song, are you ready yet?
How many times do I have to rush you?
Took you all that time for just makeup?
We're all set, just missing you!
Lower your voice. Mr director is busy pondering the next scenes.
Not yet, hang on a minute.
One more shot and I'm wrapped.
Have you got out of bed?
Remember to get money for my mom and be at the wedding photographer's studio before 1 o'clock or I won't marry you.
I'll be doomed if you don't marry me.
Well, if you don't want to be doomed, then please don't be late.
And also, I've got your suit ready in the wardrobe.
Remember to wear it, you hear me?
What the heck do you know about fashion?!
I have to get back to work, I'll see you later.
Assistant director, aren't you just taking my closeup?
This will only work if it's one continuous shot.
Let's wait for my double to get here, ok?
Hi lowell... Wayne! What a coincidence!
We're just getting pineapple buns and milk tea...
No, we're on our way to catch some crooks...
Aren't you on leave? You're all dressed up!
We're having our wedding photos taken today.
You've got to come to my wedding next month, remember that.
I'm just going after a bunch of crooks today, not like I'm tackling bank robbers.
You look like a manager in a Chinese restaurant.
Why? Are you taking your wedding photos with Chloe in a Chinese restaurant?
What the heck do you know about fashion?!
People getting married all suffer from brain damage.
Wow, so many people in here?
There's a Van at queen's road central that is illegally parked.
Please send a tow truck. Thanks.
No. Try seven eleven down the road thanks.
May I have your name, sir?
Mr huang, your date of birth is...
Sir, you do look a little mature for your age. ID number please!
I am hksar traffic warden  obstacle huang. Ui71337.
You have violated the parking regulations, and will have to pay a fine of $320.
You can settle it through online banking, pay by cash, or you can remit the money by cheque.
I can sue you for obstructing a police officer lawfully engaged in public duty.
May you perish in the line of duty.
That means you still haven't got the money.
I ran down the stairs right away.
So I was rushing you, so it's my fault?
No... l was moving too slow.
I said I am already in line.
If you sign up for this "influsurance planâ, you will definitely...
Take everything out  valuables, nonvaluables, everything!
Take the money out of the vault, I didn't get a duplicate of the key.
Do you want to end up like him?
No... give me back my car.
Hey buddy, I just want to borrow your toy car for a bit.
Will you lend it to me?
Why are you snatching his car?
Everybody was happy just chipping in.
But you have to make me kill somebody.
Yes, he is still tackling the robbers.
Reduce casualty to minimal, do not impact the civilians.
You think I would give up easily?
I'm giving you one last chance.
I will consider pleading to the judge for your commutation, or you will end up like them.
You are the one that forced me into this!
Stupid cop, you're a dead man!
You've just forced my big bro to use his masterstroke!
Now you have lost your final chance.
Banana daily cares about everything, keeping you company 24 hours a day.
And I am bringing this to you live.
We now see a great looking bank robber being in a vigorous handtohand fight with a groom.
You have the support of the viewers in the whole of Hong Kong!
A lot of people are watching, have to extend the duration?
A big hello to the viewers of tomato daily.
You must be desperate to see what's going on at the scene.
A happy and hopeful groom is having a handtohand fight with an impoverished robber.
Let's take a look at the groom...
Why don't you two keep fighting for a while.
A lot of people are watching you live, do you know that?
I am calling you baldie, baldie!
Mr robber, how are you feeling now?
Mr groom, do you have anything to say?
Tomato, thank you for your concern.
The situation is quickly heading south...
It will impact the 7 million civilians of Hong Kong anytime now heading towards the police headquarters?
I was so worried for you.
I rushed all the way from shenzhen to Hong Kong to have our wedding photos taken.
You were having fun going live.
What choices did I have when shing's life was at stake...
I couldn't just watch him die.
He is my buddy, and I am also a cop.
Are you the only cop in Hong Kong?
Are all the other cops dead?
We have been together for more than 10 years.
You promised you will let me be the star for once.
Now I am the laughing stock of the whole of Hong Kong.
How can I face the world?
It could be good publicity for you.
You have never even been promoted.
How can you support my living?
If you can support my living, I shouldn't have to work anymore.
I keep telling you not to work.
Of course I can support your living.
Who will support me if I don't work?
Speak! I am letting you speak.
No, I don't want to speak anymore.
Why do you want to be an actress?
It's not even a proper job.
Being an actress of a TV station, you keep being beat up again and again.
You have only one expression from beginning to end...
Don't force yourself to stay on this job.
You were the one that hit me.
So you were counting my flaws.
Ok, let's lay all our cards on the table.
On my mom's 60th birthday, you jumped into the sea.
Saving whom? And what were you wearing when you came to the party?
It's the underwear I bought for you.
Do you think you are Superman? And the earth will stop spinning without you?
You are the one that stopped the earth from spinning.
What is that supposed to mean?
You are more concerned about the bad guys than me.
July 8th, 2006  what is my favourite colour?
What's the name of my dog?
October 7th, 1957 how come you know that and I don't?
Who is my favourite male star?
It was just last week you said you liked al Pacino, you've changed your mind in a week?
I don't like him anymore this week.
You are just messing with me.
I even want to hit you...
There are more than Why did you have to crash the car into the chief superintendent?
You know he is the notforgiving kind.
He told me he wanted you to be "out of the way".
I have tried my best to talk him out of it.
You should remember the incident with Tony and his 2 brothers.
It was at nam sang wai, I had to fight all three of them singlehandedly and finally smashed the whole organization.
I didn't mean to claim credit, but I did sweat blood on it.
But you also burnt down half the place!
Environmental protection groups have been complaining to the chief superintendent nonstop, about how you ruin the environment and killed the birds there...
What about the incident at prat Avenue?
I had to face the enemy alone in the alley.
And I was only given a stupid Baton.
That blond kid was a national martial arts champion.
I almost died in that fight.
You have mistaken me for somebody else.
That's not me, I'm not him.
The only resemblance is that I'm wearing white  it's you!
Why is this happening to me again and again...
I cracked the case and saved the hostages, yet you got promoted and I got demoted.
The badges on my shoulders are not just mine, the honour is yours too.
Now even my wife has left me.
What has become of the world?
I told you not to go after the second tier TV stars.
Actress is a profession that brings entertainment to people.
How long do I have stay in that department?
Dinner at fook lam moon restaurant  to celebrate my promotion.
Don't worry, I will take over your cases.
And here's another piece of news  there is no need to get me wedding gifts next month.
From now on, we can leave on time!
Why do we always spend our holidays riding bikes?
Can't we go to the spa for a change?
Hey, I heard that the southAsian gang is rousing trouble again.
I am really worried that our men will be in danger.
If every time a hero saves the earth, he has to destroy half the planet to do so, has peace been restored in that case?
What are you trying to say? Be specific.
Since you have been transferred, our colleagues have livened up.
I got into less trouble, and everybody could leave on time and enjoy dinner at home.
The earth has to keep spinning  don't stand in its way.
See the beautiful trees over here.
Let's slow down and enjoy the views. Ok?
There's no need to rise to the fore everytime. It's not tour de France, you know?
It's important to go with the flow, to seek comfort and enjoy life...
Seek comfort and and enjoy life...
If no one is constructing, who will build the roads?
I am not going to back down go! Go! Go!
There is no shame in temporary failure.
Because behind hardwork and stamina, even occasional setbacks should be glorified.
I didn't come up with this...
Jin long quan movement number 4: "Dragon seeks path" "dragon whips its tail" "dragon whips its tail" Chloe, you've been nominated for worst actress in golden berries award this year again...
What do you think? Do you feel the need to work on your acting skills?
What the heck do you know about acting?
Has that "jackass of the century" called you recently?
In fact, I don't like to talk about my love life.
Shall we talk about my work?
In fact, I wish to expand my career to Japan...
Fallon zhu Hurry up, fallon zhu.
I have to go out for lunch.
What is the most important thing in life?
I'm gonna kill you, you bitch!
The contract of tsukiji's management right transfer will be ready next week.
You old moron had better sign it like a good boy.
Come here, watch TV and learn Chinese.
Get her to join the opening ceremony at tsukiji next week.
You mean the one throwing the banana or the one catching it?
This Japanese guy is one of the injured people in the bank robbery.
He is also a porn director.
Some blood stasis in his right brain is causing pressure on certain brain tissues.
It's not fatal, he's just experiencing temporary loss of memory.
About this case, the Japanese police has evidence that he is involved in a car accident in Tokyo.
They would like to have him extradited to Japan.
I am putting you in charge of this.
All the documents and air tickets are here.
You will leave day after tomorrow.
Listen, you fool! The sooner the better.
If you can fix this well, I can write a good report to have you reinstated.
I am really counting on you...!
I am really counting on you...!
I always take good care of you, you know that.
Sir, we've been looking for you.
You haven't settled the fee for your medical checkup.
Don't worry, he will settle it for me.
I am counting on you to get me back my job.
The charge for hemorrhoidectiomy has been waived.
How come... you've gained a lot of weight?
You have put on a lot of weight!
I have been transferred to the evidence room.
The longer I sit, the more I eat...
I will go on diet when I get back.
I have a job in Japan. How about you?
Don't try too hard, and most importantly...
That's right... recently congratulations! Your show...
Has very high ratings. I'm watching too.
Dear passengers, we are about to take off.
Will all passengers be seated and buckled up.
I have to get back to my seat.
Let's meet up for dinner some time.
The plane is about to take off.
Mr fallon, nice to meet you.
Good afternoon! This is inspector endo.
He is in charge of the extradition.
And I am Maggie, the interpreter  mr fallon, please.
Not me, I haven't eaten anything that will make me fart.
I don't want to go to the toilet.
Oki sergeant zhu, would you like a drink?
Sergeant zhu, is this your first visit to Japan?
You came with your girlfriend before?
I don't want to go, I don't need to poop.
I know. I was the one that farted.
In fact, being an interpreter is just a part time job for me.
Actually my real dream job is...
I'm more interested in being a helicopter pilot.
How does this lousy luck follow me from Hong Kong to Tokyo?
The car in front  pull over.
The fugitive at the back  please put on some pants!
Hello, superintendent huang, I am Maggie, interpreter for the Japanese police.
I studied in university of Tokyo.
No, not university of Beijing, it's university of Tokyo!
Where is the best onsen? I like onsens too!
Very good. Everything is going fine.
Did you get the stuff I asked for?
No problem  face masks, slimming pills, all on me...
But there is this one thing...
How could he have run away for no reason?
The suspect is only 150 pounds, how could you let him get away?
Do you want me to keep you company in the evidence room?
How could you put me in such trouble?
The Japanese police are very capable and determined to get him back.
They promised me that they will get him back within the next 2 hours.
I will call you right away if there's any news.
You had better pray that they find the suspect.
Otherwise, you won't even keep your job  No problem...
This is how good guys are repaid...
I will call you right away if there's any news.
Ouch... chief, thanks for the effort.
He's gone? What do you mean he's gone?
No... I cannot go back to Hong Kong.
Trust the Japanese police, we are very very strong...
No! I don't understand your english.
I will be demoted. I don't want to sweep the street.
I don't understand what you are saying, interpreter...
They can't find him, what do we do now?
They say they've lost the suspect.
Why did you lie to me?
Let me warn you, fallon zhu.
If you lie to me, that's byebye for you.
I will update you if there's any news.
If I can't find him, I will not come back to Hong Kong. Ok?
I got my bro Thor to help you.
If you need anything, let him know.
If you don't have enough money, ask him for it.
Mr endo, this is not my bag!
My fart can come in handy sometimes.
They are never hot. It's fake, just for show.
As long as we make money, who cares? Everybody's happy.
You don't need to do business like that.
I have been here for more than ten years.
Your boss dirty shing and I were buddies in the academy.
I used to be a cop in Hong Kong too.
Is very famous in the field.
Dirty shing told me everything about you.
You don't need to hear it from him.
Recently, I make the headline everyday.
It's a good thing to meet you today.
How about returning the What 200 thousand yen?
He said you would pay me back for him.
Last time when he came to Japan with a girl, I paid for all his expenses.
He said I can borrow money from you.
You know I have lost my luggage.
Damn! He is definitely messing with us both.
There's no point jumping up and down.
You've still got to pay me back the money.
No. I need to use the toilet.
Why didn't you say so earlier?
I am here to look for the owner.
I know you are here for the gambling money.
Please give me a few more days.
You lost betting on the soccer games, you gotta pay for it.
You wanna close down your business, right?
Can you be a bit more rational?
How can I make money when you mess up my business?
And how can I pay you back when I can't make money?
Give me the money now, idiot!
You can take my life, but there is no money.
Have some chestnuts, everyone, my treat.
Only I can hit him, you have no right to do that!
You guys can't even fix a kid.
That's all I have. Please take it for now.
All of you, stand by the wall.
And show me your ID card.
I have to lose some weight when I get back to Hong Kong.
Just in time. Let's go down.
These cops, they always arrive when the fight is over.
I didn't expect to be on the same flight with you.
Not sure if that's my lucky day or your luckless day.
The film you were shooting that day was quite a form of art...
Cast your emotions on your son.
A little more emotion from the heart.
Don't! I will not give up my son.
Do you know how much one gram of this is worth?
What have I got to do with anything?
Apart from the camera, is there any other evidence?
I put it in the rice.
I clearly saw the cops and the gangsters were on the same side.
What has become of this world?
Where can you find the dirtiest cops?
The cops in Japan are the dirtiest.
They are on the same side from the start.
We have to operate our business everyday.
There is no other way except tolerating them.
The cost for repairing this mess is worth paying the debt three times.
You think you've become a hero for saving my life once?
If you love saving lives? Be a lifeguard!
You're stopping the world from spinning tiger...
Come here! What are you doing?
No. I want to learn kungfu from uncle fallon.
I saw your kungfu skills just now.
You are one heck of a fighter.
Just now you just let people slap you around.
How can you claim you're a man?
His parents were killed in a car accident.
So she wanted to stay in Japan to take care of tiger.
And wouldn't go back to Hong Kong with me.
She also said since she could not give me a family, we should just break up.
You know women never mean what they say.
So I just stayed here with her and waited.
Why do you hold a cigarette in your mouth and not light it up?
She said I look really cool like this.
But then again she is afraid I would die from smoking.
So I always just hold it in my mouth and never light it.
How can you believe the stupid banana daily?
I've seen a lot of your celebrity girlfriend's performance.
A girl with such a pretty face has no reason to fall for you.
Let me show you some real stuff.
Several years ago in prat Avenue, I fought that blond kid singlehandedly with just a Baton.
You should have heard of that before.
The Japanese police finally found yuji at Tokyo bay.
Good morning, thanks for the effort.
A dead body floating in Tokyo bay...
From our preliminary investigation, the cause of death was drowning due to drug overdose.
That's why he fled to Hong Kong, but then was extradited back here.
He committed suicide to escape punishment.
Mr endo said it is suicide.
If this person wanted to commit suicide, he could have done it in Hong Kong.
Why did he wait till he was back in Japan to do it?
When the leaves turn yellow in Autumn, they will fall off.
The fallen leaves will return to their roots.
His whole body is bruised but not swollen?
The body has been found less than 8 hours.
Plus the water temperature was close to freezing point.
That's why the body is not swollen.
Dude, he was beaten up so badly that his eyes were crossed and lips protruded.
There's gotta be some injustice and grievance somewhere.
So the Japanese police have found him at last.
Why do you care if he's dead or alive.
But you have to give me back the money first.
Do you know just how many yujis there are in the whole of Tokyo?
You've already knocked down more than That's enough.
Is this really that guy's house?
Let's take a quick look and leave.
I'm sure I can find some lead.
There's gotta be a clue somewhere.
Quick... hit him doggie... get out!
Don't make me do it the hard way.
Get something to hit him with. Hit now!
Why did you hit me instead of the dog?
I'll live but my butt is messed up.
How long have you been a cop?
And you are still in this state after so many years?
For other people, ten years in the police force should at least be inspector grade.
Different people have different aspirations. I'm happy now.
This cell phone had been soaked in water.
Most of the files that could be retrieved are saved in there.
But there is still a video file that can't be opened.
I need some more time to fix it.
Thanks taiko drum group, for that great performance.
Let's give them a round of applause.
May I invite the organizer of the event, mr shimakura to give his speech.
She does look prettier in person than on TV.
We are on a job. Please be professional.
The special guest today... miss Chloe song.
Hasten up, why are you wasting time?
Hurry up, load the fish in the car.
One fish is missing, where did it go?
How come I'm getting a little high from eating it?
Why did they beat you up?
What are you doing? Why are you here?
That's the fatty that was messing with us at kabukicho.
You're a bad guy. I'm a good guy.
I don't care what you say.
I know who you are. Just get out of my town.
You think because you look like Nicholas tse, you can get out of this.
If we're in Hong Kong, I would have arrested you already.
He is my boss. I'm on a job here.
I'm just here to work, I have bottom lines!
This is my first time doing a performance overseas.
When will you be happy? When nobody wants to hire me for a job anymore?
I don't want anything to happen to you.
Just hear me out one last time...
Why should I hear you out one last time?
Why can't you hear me out one last time?
I always give in to you.
I don't need you to give in to me.
I just want to tell you this...
I don't want you to be involved with these bad guys.
Mr higashino... good to see you!
You are in on it together.
Our apologies everyone for this inconvenience.
Mr endo said the higoshina group has decided not to press charges on you.
The Japanese police have known it all along but there's no evidence.
It doesn't matter. This is Japan.
Am I really a 250pound cop that stops the earth from spinning?
What I've always believed to be right are actually wrong.
From now on, we can leave on time!
If you want to save lives, be a lifeguard!
How could you put me in such trouble?
Do you want me to sit with you in the evidence room?
We have been together for more than 10 years...
I just want to have a stable life.
There is much more in life that you can do, you don't have to be an actress.
And you have only one expression from beginning to end...
Don't force yourself to go on.
When will you be happy? When nobody wants to hire me for a job anymore?
We have been together for more than 10 years...
I have to talk to you.
Can you give us the space?
Don't just walk away like this...
I have to sell the restaurant, then move back to Hong Kong with tiger.
We have broken up years ago, fatty!
I've been waiting for you for more than ten years.
And all I get is a "breakup"?
You are doing very well now.
I see you are back in business.
You ruined my restaurant two days ago.
And just today, you wrecked the fish market.
Why don't you sell the Chestnut stall, then put some panties over your head and pretend to be Superman.
Do not insult my previous career.
Alright, I don't want to talk about it.
The conclusion is  I will sell the restaurant and pay back the money I owed you.
Then we don't owe each other anything.
You think you just owe me money?
You owe me much more than that why do you keep saying things the other way round?
Ok, let's solve our issues once and for all.
Let's do it. Bring it on!
You always boast about how good your chestnuts are.
That blonde guy never takes his job seriously.
If I haven't been watching him all the time, you think your chestnuts would be so delicious?
And don't you think everybody loves to play mahjong with you the Japanese women on this street refused to come unless I paid them everyday to do so.
They say you have the worst attitude.
People line up to play mahjong with me.
I really have to say this...
This idiot is obviously crazily in love with you.
He may be a bit too fat, a bit too ugly...
I don't think you have no feelings for him.
Or you wouldn't have helped him with his Chestnut business.
When he was beaten up the other day, you looked so worried.
No one can wait around for another person to love him for more than ten years.
Fighting is part of the fun.
Do not give up on Thor.
At such a cheap price too.
I have something to say to you.
We haven't seen each other for so long...
I have something to say to you.
I've been really thinking about the things you said.
I know I don't have acting talent.
You are the most popular actress these days.
The entertainment field needs pretty girls like you...
With a nice body and great acting skills.
I know you paid them to be my fans.
Did I say something wrong again...
The truth is we love each other so much.
But why do we keep fighting all the time?
We broke up and got back together...
Then broke up and got back together again and again.
The problem is as long as you are still a cop...
And when I feel insecure,  I will quit.
I can start a business like this.
My two hands and legs are healthy. Why not?
We should never come to Tokyo again.
Did you mean what you just said?
You won't be happy if you are not a cop.
In this world, there are lots of people that need good cops like you.
But I am not one of them.
When were you gonna tell me all this...
After you wrecked the Tokyo tower?
Come back to Hong Kong at once.
Do you want the earth to totally stop spinning?
Did you hear what I said?
I'd rather be a moron than be sorry for the rest of my life.
And also, nobody can stop the earth from spinning.
You dare talk back to me?
Boss, our informer said, what are you waiting for then?
Let me handle the tsukiji market issue.
You'd better sign it for me.
Shimakura, you have gone too far.
You know, you're only here because my grandfather loves you.
Don't you know I'm a good actress?
How dare you called me a bitch.
Uncle Thor, do you know where uncle fallon is?
I have been looking for him for a while now.
If there's nothing else, I will go back to help auntie with her delivery.
Do you know how much a gram of this is worth?
We managed to open the video file.
It really contains evidence of their criminal activities.
Why did you take my phone?
With this phone I'm gonna be rich!
I cook chestnuts for you everyday...
The phone contains criminal evidence of the higashino group.
With that, we won't need to sell the restaurant anymore.
The bitch has got the evidence.
The phone and your gambling debt.
If I light up a cigarette, I will look real cool even if I were to die.
Men that don't smoke are the coolest.
Why didn't you tell me sooner?
What do you want to say?
You had better call an ambulance for me.
I will make them pay for this.
You've arrived at the right time.
There was a big fight out there.
Everything is normal. Let's wrap it up.
Who do you think you are?
He's got to be involved in yuji's death.
You and shimakura are in collusion.
You were a triad member right from the start.
Sooner or later, you will pay for this. It's Karma.
Then before Karma hits me, let me tell you.
I was the one that planned out everything.
I was the one that farted in the car.
I was the one that handed yuji over to shimakura.
Do you think you are Bruce Lee reincarnated?
Have you seen "way of the dragon"?
Bruce Lee didn't wear a wig.
I'm gonna report you to the supervisor.
You idiot interpreter, I hired you because it is beneficial to me.
Sorry to disappoint you, it's shimakura.
If you don't get your ass over here, you're gonna see your girlfriend fall off the Tokyo tower.
As long as she stays safe...
I'm glad you got my invitation.
I've reserved this place for you.
I don't know what I'll do without you.
From now, on I promise I won't force you to watch my shows.
I won't make you give money to my mom.
What did you want to say?
I'm lucky enough the bullet just scratched the surface.
I am very disappointed in you.
What do you see in this fat bastard anyways?
What do you see in this fat ugly bastard?
I don't know why you do this to me.
I'm a Japanese yakusa and you're from Hong Kong.
Why are you in my life?
The police will be in force shortly and you will be arrested!
Fallon, I flew in to Japan to back you up.
We will do this together as a team, bro!
Maggie babe, why is the Japanese police so efficient this time?
Sergeant zhu uploaded all the criminal evidence on the Internet.
You know... CNN, YouTube, Facebook, wechat...
You know the Japanese, they really like the face.
But I really like my life.
I'd like to stay alive for an onsen bath later.
Fallon, beat the hell out of that little toothpick.
Did you get your license from taobao?
Fallon, how much longer are you gonna be fighting?
I'm having a lot of troubles here.
You told me to stop talking.
I was the one that asked you not to talk.
So what did you want to say?
The Japanese cops will be here soon.
If they catch you, you will be interrogated till the next century, and you'll never return to Hong Kong.
Just hold on to me tightly!
I will never let go again this time!
As long as we stay safe!
I see now that apart from straight lines, there are shapes like curves, circles and squares in this world.
As in our everyday lives, we shouldn't use just one way to solve every problem.
As long as we know how to forgive and respect others, fat or thin doesn't make any difference.
Whatever shape you put it in, so will be the shape of water.
Did the 250pound fallon zhu invent this metaphor?
